column3: â€œDragon's Breath lives up to its name. Very thin buds with lots of orange/yellow hairs that follow the shape/outline of the bud. Maybe it was the trim job or maybe they name originates from the resemblance between the hairs and actual fire. Overall, an incredible sense of well being and mental calmness washes over after just a few hits. While it still remains very potently a sativa, the energy delivered was not overwh...â€
